data.message: Hi, I’m JD and I’m looking for a mentor who can help me find my first job as a software developer. I’ve been learning JavaScript for the last 6 months and I think I’m ready.
data.background: I’ve been working as an accountant for the last 2 years, but ever since I wrote my first line of code I enjoyed so much.
data.expectation: Would be nice to have weekly meetings, but I know you might be busy so please let me know if this works for you.
